name: Text Playground
description:
Just a little something i put together one night, may possibly add more to it at some point.

WASD to move around

Press F to start typing. Then type out some letters. Then press Enter and see what happens :)

Let me know what you think!

In the future i will probably make it so the words are recognized and do different things (i.e if you type grenade it will create a force on impact to all surround objects)
